Monster.Name: Reef Shark
Monster.Description: Smaller than giant sharks and hunter sharks, reef sharks inhabit shallow waters and coral reefs, gathering in small packs to hunt. A full-grown specimen measures 6 to 10 feet long.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Breathing
MonsterTrait.Text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
